content:
FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Delegate for handling a claims token retrieval callback by registering for the ClaimsRetrieval event

In this Article

public delegate string FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler(object sender, FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Delegate
FabricClient.ClaimsRetrievalEventHandler
